title: Mathematicism
summary: Mathematicism is 'the effort to employ the formal structure and rigorous method of mathematics as a model for the conduct of philosophy'.[1] or else  it is the  epistemological view that reality is fundamentally  mathematical.[2] The term has been applied to a number of philosophers, including Pythagoras[3] and Ren√© Descartes[4] although the term is not used by themselves.
